description: Data extracted from the Bureau of Land's Site Remediation Program Database which identifies the status of all voluntary remediation projects enrolled in the Pre-Notice Site Cleanup Program (1989 to 1995) and the Site Remediation Program (1996 to the present).

name: IEPA Site Remediation Program
